attributes.background: All Pork products have been removed from most of our Schools and Hospitals. We hear that the British Government want to Ban all Pork product sales in Britain. The British people have a Right to chose what they eat and many of us won't eat Halal meat! Save our Pork!

rejection.details:
We are not aware of any plans by the UK government to plan the sale of pork products in Britain, therefore it is no clear what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. 

If you have evidence that such a ban is proposed you can resubmit this petition and include any facts supporting the petition in the description.
